cosmic_conquistadors

Class Angle

  • java.lang.Object
    • cosmic_conquistadors.Angle

  • public class Angle
extends java.lang.Object
    The Angle class represents an angle measured from the horizontal. It also has angular velocity and angular acceleration which causes it to rotate.
